Constructor Detail

AbstractSmartDocumentModel

public AbstractSmartDocumentModel()
Constructor, calling overloaded constructor without ID and in editMode Remember to call setTypeConversionMap() with a Map of any Items that need type conversion (e.g. Dates, HashMaps etc)

AbstractSmartDocumentModel

public AbstractSmartDocumentModel(java.lang.String documentId,
                                  boolean editMode)
Overloaded constructor, added by PW, allowing loading based on documentId and editMode parameters

Remember to call setTypeConversionMap() with a Map of any Items that need type conversion (e.g. Dates, HashMaps etc)

Parameters:
documentId - String alternative UNID / Note ID from which to load Document
editMode - boolean whether or not to put the document in edit mode
Method Detail

load

public void load(java.lang.String unid)
Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentMapModel
Loads the object with settings based on the passed UNID:
      Whether or not it is a new Document
      Whether or not the Document is deleted
      Whether or not the Document is read only
      Sets wrappedDoc as a DominoDocument object
      Loads all fields into the object, omitting named fields, anything prefixed with "$", or with type "Error"
Extended by PW to allow specific fields to be ignored and to ensure empty fields are loaded as "" (empty String), not "[]" (String version of empty Vector)

Overrides:
load in class AbstractDocumentMapModel
Parameters:
unid - String UNID or Note ID relating to this Document (empty = new Document)

getDateString

public java.lang.String getDateString(java.lang.String name,
                                      boolean includeTime)
Gets a Date/Time field value as a Date, returning in date only or date and time format using AppUtils.convertDateAndTime() or AppUtils.convertDate()

Parameters:
name - String Item name to get value from
includeTime - boolean whether or not to include time in the output
Returns:
String value of the Item including just date or date/time
